column1: Pacemakers may be used for people who have heart problems that cause their heart to beat too slowly.
Symptoms may be light-headedness, tiredness, fainting spells, and shortness of breath.
Other types of pacemakers can be used in severe heart failure.
- Infection - Puncture of the heart, which can lead to bleeding around the heart.
- You may be asked to wash your whole body below your neck with a special soap.
